title: To learn day by day
creator_credit: Alex Jaye and Video Media Production
brief_description: Offers advice to child care providers on appropriate strategies to facilitate the learning of basic concepts such as big, round, etc. as well as number games and colours. Provides a strategy which involves starting with concepts and moving on to comparisons. Appropriate for professional Development and personal development (Home Economics) at VCE level.
